attributes.action: To Grant amnesty to people with immigration challenges living in The UK
attributes.additional_details: To grant amnesty (The right to stay with work permit) to people having immigration challenges who have been living in The UK for a considerable amount of time.This will stop exploitation and boost the economy of The Country.
attributes.background: To Grant amnesty(legal stay with work permit) to People having immigration challenges who have been living in The UK for a considerable amount of time.This will prevent exploitation and also boost the economy of The Country.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553739

If you want immigration rules to be changed in a way that is different to that requested by the above petition you could start a new petition stating exactly what changes you want to be made to current immigration rules.
